title: Elon Threatens to Walk, TikTok's Fave CPA, Krystal Todd, and more.
summary:
Surprise, surprise: Elon is threatening to walk away from the Twitter deal. We look ahead to the upcoming public hearings from the January 6th committee. Then, Kara and Scott are joined by Friend of Pivot, Krystal Todd, CPA, to discuss her financial literacy crusade on TikTok and YouTube.
You can find Krystal on TikTok at @KrystalToddCPA and on her YouTube channel, The Cash Compass.
Send us your Listener Mail questions by calling us at 855-51-PIVOT, or via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
